thread.title: TVA Medical brings in $15mm through Series C round
thread.title_full: TVA Medical brings in $15mm through Series C round

title: TVA Medical brings in $15mm through Series C round
text:
TVA Medical brings in $15mm through Series C round Deal Date: Oct-01-2015 / Deal # 201530740 Executive Summary 
TVA Medical Inc. (minimally invasive end-stage renal disease devices) raised $15mm in Series C funding provided by new investors Baxter Ventures (lead) and Boston Scientific Corp. , along with returning backers Sante Ventures, S3 Ventures, TriStar Technology Ventures, and others. Money will fund continued development and commercialization of the company's everlinQ endoAVF system, which creates an AV fistula for hemodialysis access.
